name: Wicked John
description:
Wicked John is a story about a ex-Mafia, seeking revenge from the mafia for killing his beloved dog. The dog was given to him by his wife who lost her life to cancer. After the death of the dog, John has no motive to live apart from putting out the fire in his heart by taking his revenge. The game is a journey of how Wicked John finds out that sometimes the people who are closest to you can be the biggest threat to your life.

Controls

W,A,S,D - movement
Mouse-look
E-pick/throw gun
Space - melee weapon
left click - shoot

Kill all the enemies the progress to the next stage
Enemies are highly trained killers
Enemies can hear you when u shoot and rush towards you
Guns have only 30 bullets 

Be patient 
Be strategic 

Good Luck Player!!

This game was made for NASSCOM GDC 2018 by a team of 5.

Team Bork

Project Lead: Aaron Fernandes

Programmer: Srinivas G

Game Designer: Jayanth Rao and Sahil Rao

Game Artist: Deepanjali Sarna
